description: According to a new report from Challenger, Gray and Christmas.
contentencoded:
A report out Thursday from employment consultancy Challenger, Gray and Christmas shows American companies plan to cut 40,000 jobs -- a 20 percent drop from the previous month. 

John Challenger, CEO of Challenger, Gray and Christmas, joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison to discuss.
